ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling
1 teaspoon smoked paprika, plus more for topping
1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste
2 (8 ounce) thick-cut boneless, skinless Chilean sea bass fillets

cookingTips: Toss potatoes with oil and salt before baking to ensure they crisp and brown
Place fish on top of potatoes during the last 12-15 minutes so it doesn't overcook
Use sherry vinegar for acidity that complements the fish without overpowering delicate flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Sheet pan meals require timing vegetables correctly so everything finishes together. How can you stagger ingredient additions to achieve simultaneous doneness?
